pages.title: Spiced Desert
pages.text: I can not decide which is one is worse when

the air that resides here is extremely spicy to my lungs, it stings my throat, nose, and eyes just as the last. The spice seems emanant from the tree leaves. $(br)$(br) Don't even get me started on the weird sand that makes up the soil here, it whispers and cries as I tread it, it makes me feel unwelcome.
